thread.section_title: Hotel Beauchamps - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful hotel
thread.title_full: Beautiful hotel - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: marksmart1972
title: Beautiful hotel
text: Stunning chic little boutique hotel just yards from the Champs de Lyse - warm, friendly, helpful staff, luxuriously appointed, comfortable, warm, spotlessly clean, well kept hotel - 10 out of 10 - would most definitely recommend and stay again - if you're looking for a stylish stay in a quality hotel in this chic district this one is fantastic - and surprisingly reasonable costs too
